name: voidseo-secure
description: VoidSEO Free Tier with secure authentication

scripts.check-config: node -e "console.log('✅ Config OK si pas d\'erreur'); require('dotenv').config({path:'.env.local'}); console.log('Supabase URL:', process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL?.substring(0,30)+'...'); console.log('Anon Key:', process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY?.substring(0,30)+'...');"
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:db && npm run setup:admin

author: VoidSEO
